definition: baking soda (used to leaven bread)/screwdriver/bottle opener

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Cross-followed, each one a head-shaped screwdriver.
sentences.chinese: 另附有十字型，一字型起子头各一支。

sentences.english: If you're dead at this point, you didn't use an insulated screwdriver.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在这个环节挂了，说明你的起子不绝缘。

sentences.english: What would you like to drink?A Scotch, a screw-driver or a martini?
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰威士忌酒，还是起子酒或马丁尼酒？

sentences.english: Finish the detail drawing of a bottle opener.
sentences.chinese: 设计并绘制开瓶起子的零件图。

sentences.english: He pried the box open with a screwdriver.
sentences.chinese: 他用螺丝起子把箱子撬开了。

sentences.english: This coin may act as a screwdriver.
sentences.chinese: 这枚硬币可以充当螺丝起子用。

sentences.english: There I was, watching TV, cleaning my ear with a screwdriver.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在那儿看电视，用螺丝起子掏耳朵。

sentences.english: Are you looking for a screwdriver or a sledgehammer ?
sentences.chinese: 你找的是螺丝起子或大铁锤？

sentences.english: From screwdriver hand up grasp dried fish, foolishly look at a city beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 由起子手上抓着鱼干，呆呆地注视着京美。

sentences.english: In-line type, pen-sized, easy to carry and operate.
sentences.chinese: 此款螺丝起子为直线式，笔型大小容易携带与操作。

definition: to lift/to pry open/to lever open
